quizDescription: Test your knowledge of comedy movies with this hilarious trivia quiz!

questions.question: In which comedy movie does a group of friends go on a road trip to attend a wedding?
questions.explanation: 'The Hangover' follows a group of friends who travel to Las Vegas for a bachelor party but wake up the next morning with no memory of the previous night.

questions.question: Which comedy movie features a bumbling detective played by Leslie Nielsen?
questions.explanation: In 'The Naked Gun' series, Leslie Nielsen plays the role of Detective Frank Drebin, a clueless but well-intentioned police officer.

questions.question: Which comedy movie features a journalist traveling to Afghanistan and unexpectedly finding himself as a war correspondent?
options: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
questions.explanation: 'Tropic Thunder' follows a group of actors making a war film who end up in a real war zone, and a journalist gets caught up in the chaos.

questions.question: Which comedy movie centers around a character who becomes a mall security guard to impress his dream girl?
questions.explanation: 'Paul Blart: Mall Cop' follows Paul Blart, a mild-mannered man who becomes a mall security guard to win the heart of a woman.

questions.question: Which comedy movie tells the story of a man who ages backward, starting as an elderly man and growing younger over time?
options: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
questions.answer: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
questions.explanation: 'The Curious Case of Benjamin Button' follows the life of a man who is born elderly and ages backward, experiencing life in reverse.
